Trade/Device Name(s): VARIANT II TURBO Link Hemoglobin A1c Program
VARIANT II TURBO Link Hemoglobin Testing System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VARIANT II TURBO Link Hemoglobin Testing System
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Cation exchange high performance liquid chromatography
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bio-Rad VARIANT II TURBO Link Hemoglobin A1c Program using ion-exchange HPLC for percent determination of hemoglobin A1c in whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Percent determination of hemoglobin A1c in human whole blood using ion-exchange high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) to monitor long-term glucose control in individuals with diabetes mellitus, for use with the VARIANT II TURBO Link Hemoglobin Testing System with automated sample transport.
